content: ch2 slip_stitch ch1 slip_stitch into the next ch1 repeat from* 5 more times join with a slip_stitch fo round 3 ch4 and 3 picots to create the snow crystals round 3 slip_stitch ch2 slip_stitch worked into the middle of the triangles eve s crochet corner 2020 updated in 2022 ch4 into the ch1s from previous round to create your picots after creating your picots sl sl into the ch1 again eve s crochet corner 2020 updated in 2022 join with a slip_stitch into the last ch1 from previous round and fasten_off weave in your end s or use your yarn tail to make a hanging loop you can also chain your snowflakes together to make a garland eve s crochet corner 2020 updated in 2022 thank you for your support by downloading my pattern i would love to see your finished snowflakes please tag me so i can see them #evescrochetcorner on instagram eve s crochet corner 2020 updated in 2022 eve s crochet corner 2020 updated in 2022
